sub_task: P0 DIAGNOSIS - FINN Cognitive Gateway OFF State

executive_summary.impact: Canonical signal pipeline completely dormant for 30+ days
executive_summary.resolution_path: CEO approval required for OFF → SHADOW → LIVE transition

finding_1.issue: FINN_COGNITIVE_GATEWAY created with mode=OFF as default

evidence.note: updated_at = created_at proves mode was NEVER changed

finding_2.issue: Gateway designed to require explicit CEO activation

design.OFF_behavior: Returns NoSignal immediately without invoking FINN

finding_3.issue: VEGA attestation 'UNBLOCKED' referred to EVIDENCE FRESHNESS, not gateway mode

evidence.clarification: UNBLOCKED = evidence freshness within threshold. Does NOT mean mode changed from OFF.

finding_4.issue: No governance action exists to activate gateway

evidence.conclusion: FINN has never produced signals to this table

step_1.effect: Returns NoSignal without invoking FINN LLM

step_2.effect: No raw signals for ios007 to process

workaround_in_use.note: This is an ALTERNATE pathway bypassing canonical ios007 → ios008 flow

step_1.action: CEO approval for OFF → SHADOW transition
step_1.implementation: UPDATE fhq_governance.task_registry SET task_config = task_config || '{"mode": "SHADOW"}' WHERE task_name = 'FINN_COGNITIVE_GATEWAY'

step_3.action: CEO approval for SHADOW → LIVE transition

constitutional.ADR-012: Economic safety requires explicit CEO authorization for LLM spend
constitutional.ADR-020: Autonomous cognitive operations require governance gates

immediate.action: CEO decision on FINN gateway activation
options: A: Activate to SHADOW for 48h observation
B: Keep OFF and rely on IOS012B alternate pathway
C: Remediate other issues first (data freshness, scheduler)

if_activated: Verify ios007/ios008 scheduler will pick up new signals
